entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Catharines
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:13 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 9.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 4:14 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 9.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 9.8°C
Wind: SW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
